title: BTS Returns From Break With First South Korean Concerts Since 2019
sub_head: K-Pop band plans for in-person performances despite Omicron outbreak in home country, as pre-pandemic life inches back
body:
SEOUL—In the latest sign that life is going back to something that resembles the pre-pandemic past, BTS is returning to the stage in Seoul.
The K-pop band, which had performed in the U.S. but not in its home country since 2019, is holding three in-person concerts in South Korea next month, the group’s management agency, HYBE Co., said on Wednesday.
